text: [You feel something wet and slimy under your foot. You take a step back and try to shake it off.]

name: Tiana
text: That doesn’t look very safe…I should probably leave soon.
[You couldn’t help but let your eye wander into the water. The black goo looked like it connected in a straight line to other lines of goo.]
[And in the middle of all of them? A black blanket over the bottom of the pool.]
[You look towards the door, but when you look back, the blob is growing.]

name: Tiana
text: Okay! Okay! I really need to go!
[You tried to move, but your legs were frozen in place.]
[All you could do was watch as this gross thing crested to the surface of the pool.]
